remarks: Any assignment of unit vectors to target vectors can be extended (uniquely) to a homomorphism from a free module to an arbitrary other module on the same base ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
statement:
frlmup.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmup.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmup.c $e |- C = ( Base ` T ) $.
frlmup.v $e |- .x. = ( .s ` T ) $.
frlmup.e $e |- E = ( x e. B |-> ( T gsum ( x oF .x. A ) ) ) $.
frlmup.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. LMod ) $.
frlmup.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. X ) $.
frlmup.r $e |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` T ) ) $.
frlmup.a $e |- ( ph -> A : I --> C ) $.
frlmup1 $p |- ( ph -> E e. ( F LMHom T ) ) $.
